title: people think being rich is awesome, well i'm here to tell you it's not..
body:
you don't know which friends are real anymore, because to much time has past.

you don't know if your new woman likes you or just acts perfect to marry you one day (money)

if you want a good pizza then flying to Italia might take 5 hours, even on your privat Jet

you find yourself drinking and smoking to much, getting fat, you're afraid it will kill you so fast you might actually die a young man. because with money there is nothing stopping you from fulfilling every sick thought you ever had.

**sometimes in life, less is actually more, enjoying the small things in life will make you much happier..**
